contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1935 D Borders and Lothian Brass Band League
Borders and Lothian Brass Band League 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
borders-and-lothian-brass-band-league
None
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Victoria Park, Newtongrange, Midlothian
March contest - 1st Newtongrange(84), 2nd Edinburgh Trades(82), 3rd Galashiels(76). Hymn tune - 1st Hawick(54), 2nd Newtongrange(48), 3rd tie between Selkirk Burgh and Bathgate. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 25, 2013, 9:34 a.m. Feb. 16, 2016, 9:46 a.m.
1 Bathgate Band J. Riley
2 Newtongrange Band Harry Muddiman
3 Galashiels Town James Amos
4 Edinburgh Trades Herbert Kearsley
5 Hawick Saxhorn Band George Guy
6 Selkirk Silver Tom Young
